calculate_errors <- function(data_scores) {
  data_scores %>%
    mutate(pred_diff2 = (compressive_strength - prediction)^2) %>%
    mutate(pred_abs = abs(compressive_strength - prediction)) %>%
    summarize(rmse = sqrt(mean(pred_diff2)), mae = mean(pred_abs)) %>%
    collect()
}
